lemma onll_step_to_invariantI [intro]: assumes sinv: "A \<TTurnstile>\<^sub>A (I \<rightarrow>) onll \<Gamma> Q" and wf: "wellformed \<Gamma>" and init: "\<And>\<xi> l p. \<lbrakk> (\<xi>, p) \<in> init A; l\<in>labels \<Gamma> p \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (\<xi>, l)" and step: "\<And>\<xi> p l \<xi>' l' a. \<lbrakk> (\<xi>, p) \<in> reachable A I; l\<in>labels \<Gamma> p; P (\<xi>, l); Q ((\<xi>, l), a, (\<xi>', l')); I a\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (\<xi>', l')" shows "A \<TTurnstile> (I \<rightarrow>) onl \<Gamma> P"
